Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hilton Singapore, you'll be centrally located in Singapore, steps from Orchard Tower and Royal Thai Embassy. This 4.5-star hotel is close to National Orchid Garden and Chinatown Heritage Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 421 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and DVD players. 29-inch LCD televisions with premium TV channels provide entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a steam room. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants and 3 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants and 3 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a steam room. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands.
Make yourself at home in one of the 421 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and DVD players. 29-inch LCD televisions with premium TV channels provide entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

With a stay at Hilton Singapore, you'll be centrally located in Singapore, steps from Orchard Tower and Royal Thai Embassy. This 4.5-star hotel is close to National Orchid Garden and Chinatown Heritage Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Orchard Tower - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Royal Thai Embassy - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Tanglin Shopping Centre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Shaw Centre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
DFS Galleria Singapore - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
ION Orchard - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Far East Plaza - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Wisma Atria - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Lucky Plaza - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Ngee Ann City - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Paragon Shopping Centre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Mount Elizabeth Medical Center - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Takashimaya Shopping Centre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Orchard Road - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Great World City Mall - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Singapore is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 18.6 km / 11.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hilton Singapore is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text: Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
